location.zh-cn: 美国纽约市联合国总部
location.en: Headquarters of the United Nations, New York City, USA

description.zh-cn: 联合国的六个主要机构之一，负有维持国际和平、安全的责任，是唯一有权采取强制行动的联合国机构。
description.en: One of the six principal organs of the United Nations, charged with ensuring international peace and security. It is the only UN body with the authority to issue binding resolutions to member states.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的政府间国际组织，致力于促进国际合作，并创造和维持国际秩序。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization whose stated purposes are to maintain international peace and security, develop friendly relations among nations, achieve international cooperation, and be a centre for harmonizing the actions of nations.

en: Principal organs of the United Nations

description.zh-cn: 根据《联合国宪章》设立的联合国六个主要机关。
description.en: The six main bodies of the United Nations established by the UN Charter.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的创始条约，确立了联合国及其主要机构的宗旨、原则和组织框架。
description.en: The foundational treaty of the United Nations, establishing the purposes, principles, and organizational framework of the UN and its principal organs.

nodes.id: 联合国安全理事会常任理事国

zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会常任理事国
en: Permanent members of the United Nations Security Council

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会中拥有否决权的五个常任席位，包括中国、法国、俄罗斯、英国和美国。
description.en: The five permanent seats on the UN Security Council with veto power, held by China, France, Russia, the United Kingdom, and the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1971年联合国大会通过的关于“恢复中华人民共和国在联合国组织中的合法权利问题”的决议，承认中华人民共和国政府的代表是中国在联合国组织的唯一合法代表。
description.en: A resolution passed by the United Nations General Assembly in 1971 on the 'Restoration of the lawful rights of the People's Republic of China in the United Nations', recognizing the representatives of the Government of the PRC as the only lawful representatives of China to the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，联合国安全理事会常任理事国之一。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 1912年在中国大陆建立的共和制国家。1949年后其政府迁至台湾，在1971年之前代表中国在联合国的席位。
description.en: A republic established in mainland China in 1912. Its government relocated to Taiwan in 1949 and held China's seat in the United Nations until 1971.

description.zh-cn: 位于欧亚大陆北部的联邦共和国，继承苏联在联合国安全理事会的常任理事国席位。
description.en: A federal republic in Northern Eurasia, which succeeded the Soviet Union's permanent seat on the UN Security Council.

zh-cn: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟

description.zh-cn: 1922年至1991年间存在的欧亚大陆社会主义国家，联合国创始会员国与安理会常任理事国之一。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991, a founding member of the United Nations and one of the permanent members of the Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 指1991年12月26日苏联最高苏维埃宣布苏联停止存在的事件。
description.en: The event on December 26, 1991, when the Supreme Soviet of the Soviet Union declared the dissolution of the USSR.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦首任总统。
description.en: The first President of the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 由部分前苏联共和国组成的地区性国际组织。
description.en: A regional intergovernmental organization of some post-Soviet republics.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后成立的国际组织，是联合国的先行者。
description.en: An international organization founded after the First World War, the predecessor to the United Nations.

nodes.id: 联合国安全理事会第1973号决议

zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会第1973号决议

description.zh-cn: 2011年联合国安理会通过的关于利比亚局势的决议，授权会员国采取一切必要措施保护平民。
description.en: A resolution passed by the UN Security Council in 2011 regarding the situation in Libya, authorizing member states to take all necessary measures to protect civilians.

description.zh-cn: 2011年发生在利比亚的武装冲突，导致了卡扎菲政权的倒台。
description.en: An armed conflict in 2011 in Libya which led to the overthrow of the Gaddafi government.

description.zh-cn: 联合国秘书处的首长，是联合国的“首席行政长官”。
description.en: The head of the United Nations Secretariat, acting as the 'chief administrative officer' of the Organisation.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的六个主要机构之一，是联合国的主要审议、决策和代表机构。
description.en: One of the six principal organs of the United Nations, serving as the main deliberative, policymaking, and representative organ of the UN.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的六大主要机构之一和最主要的司法机关。
description.en: One of the six principal organs and the primary judicial organ of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 位于西欧的共和国，联合国安全理事会常任理事国之一。
description.en: A republic located in Western Europe and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲大陆西北面的岛国，联合国安全理事会常任理事国之一。
description.en: An island country situated off the northwestern coast of the European mainland, and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美洲的联邦共和国，联合国安全理事会常任理事国之一。
description.en: A federal republic in North America and a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会是联合国的六大主要机构之一。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council is one of the six principal organs of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会是联合国的六大主要机构之一。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council is one of the six principal organs of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 《联合国宪章》规定了联合国安全理事会的职权，使其负有维持国际和平与安全的责任。
description.en: The Charter of the United Nations defines the powers of the Security Council, charging it with the responsibility for maintaining international peace and security.

description.zh-cn: 通过该决议，中华人民共和国政府的代表取代中华民国政府的代表，继承了中国在联合国及安全理事会的席位。
description.en: Through this resolution, the representatives of the Government of the People's Republic of China replaced those of the Government of the Republic of China, inheriting China's seat in the United Nations and the Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 该决议通过后，中华民国政府的代表被逐出联合国，失去了其在联合国及安理会的席位。
description.en: Following the adoption of this resolution, the representatives of the Government of the Republic of China were expelled from the United Nations, losing its seat in the UN and the Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 苏联解体后，其在联合国安全理事会的常任理事国席位由俄罗斯联邦接替。
description.en: After the dissolution of the Soviet Union, its permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council was succeeded by the Russian Federation.

description.zh-cn: 时任俄罗斯总统的叶利钦致信联合国秘书长，通知其俄罗斯联邦继承苏联在安理会及联合国所有其他机关的成员资格。
description.en: Then-President of Russia, Boris Yeltsin, sent a letter to the UN Secretary-General informing him that the Russian Federation was succeeding the Soviet Union's membership in the Security Council and all other UN organs.

description.zh-cn: 独立国家联合体的成员国支持俄罗斯联邦继承苏联在联合国安全理事会的席位。
description.en: The member states of the Commonwealth of Independent States supported the Russian Federation's succession to the Soviet Union's seat on the UN Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会规定其成员国必须有代表常驻联合国，以便随时召开会议。这一规定吸取了国际联盟因无法快速应对危机而失败的教训。
description.en: The United Nations Security Council requires its member states to have permanent representatives at the UN to enable meetings to be convened at any time. This rule was learned from the failures of the League of Nations, which was unable to respond quickly to crises.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会就秘书长的任命向联合国大会提出建议。
description.en: The UN Security Council makes a recommendation to the UN General Assembly for the appointment of the Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会与联合国大会共同选举国际法院的法官。
description.en: The UN Security Council, together with the UN General Assembly, elects the judges of the International Court of Justice.

relationships.target: 联合国安全理事会第1973号决议

description.zh-cn: 联合国安全理事会通过了第1973号决议，决定对第一次利比亚内战进行介入。
description.en: The UN Security Council passed Resolution 1973, deciding to intervene in the First Libyan Civil War.

relationships.source: 联合国安全理事会第1973号决议

description.zh-cn: 第1973号决议授权在利比亚设立禁飞区并采取一切必要措施保护平民，从而对利比亚内战进行了军事介入。
description.en: Resolution 1973 authorized the establishment of a no-fly zone over Libya and all necessary measures to protect civilians, thereby leading to military intervention in the Libyan Civil War.
